entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [ApiCompat] Support passing in multiple suppression files #26746
  • Mismatch between supported RIDs and the expected RID parameter #26737
  • PublishRelease=true in project file doesn't actually change the configuration to "Release" when running "dotnet publish" #26732

PullRequests

Updated

  • Use the Implicit SDK RID for RID-Specific Apps by Default + Add PublishSelfContained #26143
    Area-Infrastructure
  • ApiCompat: Add ValidateAssemblies msbuild task and add global tool #26616
    Area-Compatibility
  • dotnet/templating#3829 evaluating project context for dotnet new execution #26523
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [24068] Remove Legacy -- behavior and use of UnparsedTokens #25854
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Migrate dotnet new Cli, dotnet-new3, *.IntegrationTests, *.UnitTests, template_feed to SDK #26521
    Area-Templates
